thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Where are they now?

author: news24.com
title: Where are they now?
text:
The question by Mondli Makhanya (MK) is very interesting.
It is so interesting in the sense that he was the editor of another Newspaper when this chaos of political discourse started in the country.
He made a comment indicating that Thabo Mbeki (TM) was untouchable and full of himself, he was not media-friendly.
He praised the man who was about to take over from him, in this case Jacob Zuma(JZ).
Today, the same MK is singing a different tune.
If we ask about the whereabouts of Zwelinzima Vavi(ZV), he is in the political wilderness, dumped by his own beloved COSATU.
That is the nature of politics in the Democratic Dispensation.
This Article is like a Fiction whereby, everyone has got a role to play, MK, TM, JZ and ZV.
